    # 抽屉 Drawer

    # 抽屉 Drawer 基础样式

    Basic Drawer

    Some contents...

    Some contents...

    Some contents...

       <template>
    <Button @click="value1 = true" type="primary">Open</Button>
    <Drawer class="tmx-drawer" title="Basic Drawer" :closable="false" v-model="value1">
        <p>Some contents...</p>
        <p>Some contents...</p>
        <p>Some contents...</p>
    </Drawer>
</template>
